'''Yinggong''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who appeared in ''[[The Exquisite Night Chimes]]''.

==Location==
;During ''[[The Exquisite Night Chimes]]''
<gallery>
NPC Location Yinggong.png|Yinggong's location

==Profile==
Yinggong is an employee of the [[Yun-Han Opera Troupe]], he works backstage at plays as a stagehand. In his spare time, he likes to create paper theater plays to entertain children.

==Dialogue==
===Before Backstage Helpers===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yinggong:''' So, are you guys ready?
:{{DIcon|Paper Theater}} Yes.
::'''Yinggong:''' Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, I present to you &mdash; Homeward, Bravebeard!
:{{DIcon}} I'm not ready yet.
::'''Yinggong:''' Don't worry. It's only natural to be a bit nervous.
{{Dialogue End}}
===After Backstage Helpers===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yinggong:''' Back so soon after the performance? Maybe you want to give it another go?
:{{DIcon|Paper Theater}} I want to see it again.
::'''Yinggong:''' Haha, it seems you really enjoy this. Let's do an extra performance then.
:{{DIcon}} About the [[Yun-Han Opera Troupe]]...
::'''Yinggong:''' No special performance has been planned for this year's [[Lantern Rite]]. After all, we've already performed for many years' Lantern Rite in succession. So this year, we can finally have a good rest.
::'''Yinggong:''' That said, I started getting a little restless and decided to put on a paper play for the kids, haha.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Yinggong:''' Goodbye for now. When we meet again, I shall show you the costumes and props I've made.
{{Dialogue End}}
